name: Charlie's Farming
description:
Game sent to MFGJ 2023: Winter, started with 5 days left for the deadline.

Project under development with the purpose of learning how to create games in Construct 3. Accepting suggestions, ideas and feedback.

WASD/Arrows - Move

I - Open/Close plus inventory

Mouse(Left) - Interact

Mouse(Scroll) - Change inventory Slot

1 to 5 - Select Slots

Art by Krishna Palacio
